document_data.name: Diabolic Grasp
document_data.mainbody: '''''Diabolic grasp''''' was a [[spell]] known to [[warlock]]s of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], particularly those with the [[Warlock#Infernal Pact Warlock|infernal pact]].
document_data.Effects: By putting their hand in the shape of a claw, ''diabolic grasp'' allowed a warlock to create a large talon of sulfurous darkness that could injure and drag a creature an [[ogre]]'s size or smaller within {{SI|50|ft|long=yes}} a distance of at least {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}}.
